Web 3, also known as the decentralized web, is the internet’s next evolutionary step. It introduces a new paradigm of decentralization, transparency, and user control, in contrast to its antecedent, Web 2, which relied on centralized platforms and intermediaries. Also, Web 3 enables peer-to-peer interactions, data ownership, and enhanced privacy by leveraging emerging technologies such as blockchain and smart contracts. It promotes the development of decentralized applications (dApps), decentralized finance (DeFi), and digital identities, thereby revolutionizing online interaction, commerce, and collaboration. Adopting Web 3 creates opportunities for a more secure, inclusive, and user-centric digital ecosystem. Robin Hood Army bring you this masterclass to learn Web 3 for free!
